Posts.Content: Tanya22 wrote: Hi,  I am 22 years old and just recently ( in the last month ) found a lump on my right breast, i went to my GP who then referred me to the breast clinic.  Where an ultrasound then a biopsy was done, during my ultrasound the doctor stated that it "looked benign" .  After my biopsy my doctor seemed prett confident it would be fibroadeoma type of lump. However i am still a little worried as i have to go back this Thur for my results and i am unsure if there is still a possibility it could be something else or it may need to be removed.  I havnt spoke to anyone regarding this although my parents are aware of it i just dont want them to think i am worrying so any help or advise would be greatly appreciated. Thankyou x Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 22 YEAR OLD AWAITING BIOPSY Tanya22 dragonfly55

Posts.Content: Apr 22, 2011 04:48PM Tanya22 wrote: Thankyou, i am still out there  living my life hehe, just i am the type never to discuss things with people close to me as i dont like to appear vulnerable.  Just didnt want to make a big deal out of nothing by discussing with people close to me, but at the same time wanted to be prepared for the worse if you get me.  Thankyou again x
